name: Grandma Alma's Swedish Hardtack
author: Dunbarmama
summary: This is a delicious and yummy cracker passed down from my Swedish grandmother. It is a great and economical alternative to store-bought crackers and processed snacks. Big hit with kids, and a great way to sneak some healthier snacks into their everyday diet. Fast, easy, and great results!
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Mix oats, flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl
Mix in milk until dough comes together in a ball
Roll out very thinly on a floured surface using a Swedish or notched rolling pin
Cut into 2-inch pieces and place on a baking sheet
Bake crackers until tops are just very slightly golden, 10 to 15 minutes
